sourcesContent:
const [topScores, setTopScores] = useState([{ username:'default-ukko', time: 123, id: 1 }]) const Leaderboard = ({ topScores }) => { const isOverAnHour = (time) => (Math.floor(time/6000) < 1) return (
{topScores.length ? topScores.map((score, index) => ) : null}
# Username Time
{index+1} {score.username} { (isOverAnHour(score.time) ? '' : (Math.floor(score.time/6000) + ':')) + ('0' + Math.floor(score.time / 100 % 60)).slice(-2) + ':' + ('0' + (Math.floor(score.time)) % 100).slice(-2)}
) } export default Leaderboard
